title: P2 large letter Speaker PSA 5 for sale
author: edhans

posts.post_title: P2 large letter Speaker PSA 5 for sale
posts.post_content: $300.00 delivered. Check or Money order only-no electronic payments-PO Box 307; Buffalo, NY. 14207. New York residents must add sales tax. Email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] to reserve. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations, requests for additional information, etc. Please visit my newly updated website below for additional offerings. Thank you for looking.
